value:
My mother was a noble, but she fell in
love with a man from the plains, and
they eloped.

My father was chieftain of the Lorca
tribe. I wanted to protect our people in
his stead, but...now I'm the last of us.

Allow me to take over some of your
responsibilities so you can get some
extra sleep.$k$pWhen morning comes, I'll make sure
you wake up on time.

This is Mulagir, the bow of swift
wind, and one of the legendary
weapons.$k$pI hear it was once wielded by a
woman named Hanon.

To train one's sight upon a moving
target from atop a galloping horse
and then strike with perfect accuracy.$k$pCommon practice for people of the
plains.

Greetings from
$Nf. I hope
you'll continue—$k$pOh? Excuse me if my manners seem
a bit off...
Father, Mother... Watch over me.
It's as if this bow is guiding me...

I must be careful to remain atop
my horse.

Thank you. I'll do my best to live
up to your expectations.

My name is Lyndis. Allow me to put
this legendary Sacaen bow to use by
assisting you.

Two types of blood run through my
veins: that of a noble household, and
that of the Sacaen Plains.$k$pI hold these two sides in equal
importance. This heritage is what
makes me who I am, but moreover...$k$pIt allows me to feel as though my
father and mother look after me still.$k$pAnd should I someday be wed and
have children of my own, I'll watch
over them in turn.$k$pHm... That's a strange thing to think
about at a time like this, isn't it? I
could die tomorrow, after all.$k$pBut maybe that's why I think about
such things. Someone to carry on my
parents' bloodline...$k$pAnd their happiness.
ええいっ！
そこよ！
きゃああっ！
ま、まだよ…！
Prepare yourself!
I won't miss!
Bow of Sacae!
Find your target!
Father... Mother...
Hmmm...
You think this outfit suits me? Thanks.
If you want to use a bow, first quiet your mind and let your body relax...
I was having a dream, and in that dream, you saved me...
You REALLY remind me of another tactician I know.
My father was an incredibly skilled horseman and a great shot with a bow, too.
Father... Mother... Are you watching over me?
You're special to me. That feeling has been building for a long time. It crept up on me.
Yes.
The enemy!
Stay close.
